name: IT & Computer Commands
description: Common commands and instructions used in IT support and daily computer use. Spanish to English, now with visual aids!

sideA.text: Haz clic en el bot√≥n de 'Aceptar'.

sideB: Go ahead and click the 'OK' button.
Can you please hit the 'Accept' button?
Just click on 'OK'.

sideA.text: Abre el archivo de Excel.

sideB: Please open the Excel file.
Can you open up the Excel spreadsheet?
Go ahead and open that Excel sheet.

sideA.text: Hazle doble clic al √≠cono de la carpeta.

sideB: Double-click on the folder icon.
Give that folder icon a double-click.
Just double-click the folder to open it.

sideA.text: Selecciona la √∫ltima opci√≥n del men√∫.

sideB: Select the last option from the menu.
Please choose the very last option.
Go ahead and pick the bottom option.

sideA.text: Cierra esa ventana, por favor.

sideB: You can close that window now.
Go ahead and close out that window.
Please close that window for me.

sideA.text: Despl√°zate hacia abajo un poco.

sideB: Can you scroll down a little bit?
Go ahead and scroll down some.
Just scroll down a bit.

sideA.text: Ahora sube hasta el principio de la p√°gina.

sideB: Okay, now scroll all the way up to the top.
Can you scroll back to the top of the page?
Go ahead and scroll up to the very top.

sideA.text: Anda a la p√°gina siguiente.

sideB: Let's go to the next page.
Can you move to the next page?
Please proceed to the next page.

sideA.text: Vuelve a la pantalla anterior.

sideB: Go back to the previous screen.
Can you navigate back to the last screen?
Let's go back one screen.

sideA.text: C√°mbiate a la pesta√±a del navegador.

sideB: Switch over to the browser tab.
Can you go to your browser tab?
Please switch to the web browser.

sideA.text: Escribe 'reporte de ventas' en la barra de b√∫squeda.

sideB: Type 'sales report' in the search bar.
Just enter 'sales report' into the search field.
Go ahead and search for 'sales report'.

sideA.text: Ingresa tu contrase√±a para continuar.

sideB: Please enter your password to continue.
You'll need to type in your password.
Go ahead and put in your password.

sideA.text: Ejecuta el comando 'npm install' en la terminal.

sideB: Run the command 'npm install' in the terminal.
Please type 'npm install' into the console.
Go ahead and run 'npm install'.

sideA.text: Rellena los campos del formulario.

sideB: Please fill out the fields on the form.
Can you fill in that form for me?
Go ahead and complete the form.

sideA.text: Sube el documento que te envi√©.

sideB: Upload the document I sent you.
Please upload that document.
Can you go ahead and upload the file?

sideA.text: Descarga ese archivo, por favor.

sideB: Please download that file.
Can you go ahead and download that?
I need you to download that file.

sideA.text: Arrastra esa imagen al escritorio.

sideB: Drag that image onto the desktop.
Can you drag and drop that picture to the desktop?
Please move that image over to the desktop.

sideA.text: Copia todo ese texto.

sideB: Copy all of that text.
Please select and copy all that text.
Go ahead and copy the entire text block.

sideA.text: Ahora p√©galo en el correo.

sideB: Now, paste it into the email.
Go ahead and paste that into the body of the email.
Can you paste it in the email now?

sideA.text: Destaca la primera oraci√≥n.

sideB: Highlight the first sentence.
Can you select the first sentence for me?
Just highlight that first sentence.

sideA.text: Borra el archivo que se llama 'Temporal'.

sideB: Delete the file named 'Temp'.
Please erase the 'Temp' file.
Go ahead and get rid of the file called 'Temp'.

sideA.text: Crea una nueva carpeta aqu√≠.

sideB: Create a new folder here.
Please make a new folder in this location.
Can you create a new folder for me right there?

sideA.text: Hazle zoom para que podamos ver mejor.

sideB: Can you zoom in so we can see better?
Please zoom in a little bit.
Go ahead and zoom in for us.

sideA.text: Ahora al√©jalo para ver la p√°gina completa.

sideB: Okay, now zoom out to see the full page.
Can you zoom back out?
Please zoom out so we can see everything.

sideA.text: Refresca la p√°gina, por favor.

sideB: Please refresh the page.
Can you hit the refresh button?
Let's try reloading the page.

sideA.text: Abre ese enlace en una pesta√±a nueva.

sideB: Open that link in a new tab.
Right-click and open that in a new tab.
Can you open that link in a separate tab?

sideA.text: Maximiza esa ventana.

sideB: Please maximize that window.
Can you make that window full screen?
Go ahead and maximize the window.

sideA.text: Minimiza el navegador un momento.

sideB: Minimize the browser for a moment.
Can you just minimize the browser window?
Go ahead and minimize that for a second.

sideA.text: Detente ah√≠ mismo, por favor.

sideB: Stop right there, please.
Okay, hold on for a second.

sideA.text: Comparte tu escritorio completo, no solo una ventana.

sideB: Can you share your entire screen, not just the window?
Please re-share and choose 'Entire Screen' or 'Desktop'.
We need to see your whole desktop, can you share that instead?

sideA.text: Copia el t√≠tulo y p√©galo al inicio del documento.

sideB: Copy the title and paste it at the beginning of the document.
Go ahead and copy the headline and paste it at the top of the doc.
Can you copy the title and then paste it right at the start?

sideA.text: Copia solo la direcci√≥n de correo electr√≥nico, nada m√°s.

sideB: Copy just the email address, nothing else.
Please copy only the email address.
I just need you to copy the email address itself.

sideA.text: Pega el enlace que te envi√© directamente en el chat.

sideB: Paste the link I sent you directly into the chat.
Go ahead and drop the link I sent you in the chat window.
Can you paste that link into the chat for everyone?

sideA.text: Usa el atajo Control-V para pegarlo ah√≠.

sideB: Use the shortcut Control-V to paste it there.
You can just use Control-V to paste it.
Go ahead and hit Control-V to paste.

sideA.text: P√©galo sin formato para que no se arruine el estilo.

sideB: Paste it without formatting so it doesn't mess up the style.
Can you paste it as plain text?
Please use 'Paste and match style' to avoid formatting issues.

sideA.text: Copia el n√∫mero de la celda A5 y p√©galo en la otra hoja.

sideB: Copy the number from cell A5 and paste it into the other sheet.
Please copy the value in A5 and paste it on the other tab.
Go ahead and copy cell A5 and paste it onto the next sheet.

sideA.text: Para estar seguros, copia ese c√≥digo y p√©galo en un bloc de notas.

sideB: To be safe, copy that code and paste it into a notepad.
Let's copy that code and drop it in a text file just in case.
Can you copy the code and paste it somewhere safe like Notepad?

sideA.text: Aseg√∫rate de que est√°s copiando la URL completa, incluyendo el "https".

sideB: Make sure you're copying the entire URL, including the "https".
Please ensure you copy the full web address, starting with "https".
Double-check that you've copied the whole URL.

sideA.text: Corta ese p√°rrafo de ah√≠ y p√©galo dos secciones m√°s abajo.

sideB: Cut that paragraph from there and paste it two sections down.
Go ahead and cut that paragraph and move it two sections lower.
Can you cut that paragraph and paste it below the second heading?

sideA.text: Copiemos ese mensaje de error y pegu√©moslo en Google para ver qu√© significa.

sideB: Let's copy that error message and paste it into Google to see what it means.
Go ahead and copy the error and search for it on Google.
Can you copy that error message and we'll google it?

sideA.text: Por favor, sigue los pasos que te indiqu√©.

sideB: Please follow the steps I showed you.
Can you follow the instructions I gave you?
Go ahead and follow the steps I laid out.

sideA.text: Necesito que sigas los pasos que pegu√© en el chat.

sideB: I need you to follow the steps I pasted in the chat.
Please follow the instructions I dropped in the chat window.
Can you go through the steps I just pasted in the chat?

sideA.text: El siguiente paso es hacer clic en 'Enviar'.

sideB: The next step is to click 'Submit'.
Okay, for the next step, just click on 'Submit'.
Next, you'll need to hit the 'Submit' button.

sideA.text: Vas a recibir un correo con un enlace de verificaci√≥n.

sideB: You're going to receive an email with a verification link.
Look for an email containing a link to verify your account.
An email with a verification link will be sent to you shortly.

sideA.text: Revisa tu bandeja de entrada, deber√≠as tener un nuevo mensaje.

sideB: Please check your inbox, you should have a new message.
Can you check your email? A new message should be there.
Go ahead and check your inbox for a new email.

sideA.text: Abre el correo y haz clic en el bot√≥n para confirmar.

sideB: Open the email and click the button to confirm.
Please open that email and click the confirmation button.
Find the email and just click the button inside to confirm.

sideA.text: Si no lo ves, revisa la carpeta de spam o correo no deseado.

sideB: If you don't see it, check your spam or junk folder.
Be sure to check the spam folder if it's not in your inbox.
It might have gone to your junk mail, can you check there?

sideA.text: D√©jame tomar el control remoto para ayudarte con eso.

sideB: Let me take remote control to help you with that.
Can I request remote control of your screen?
I'll request control now to take a look.

sideA.text: Necesito que aceptes la solicitud para compartir pantalla.

sideB: I need you to accept the screen share request.
Please accept the prompt to share your screen.
A request to share your screen should have popped up, please accept it.

sideA.text: Primero, guarda tu trabajo antes de que reiniciemos.

sideB: First, please save your work before we restart.
Go ahead and save everything you're working on, then we'll reboot.
Let's save your work before we do anything else.

sideA.text: Anda a la "Configuraci√≥n del Sistema" para revisar los ajustes de red.

sideB: Go to 'System Settings' to check the network configuration.
Can you open up 'System Settings' so we can look at the network settings?
Let's head over to 'System Settings' and check the network setup.

sideA.text: Ahora, anda al Finder para que busquemos un archivo.

sideB: Okay, now go to Finder so we can look for a file.
Let's open a new Finder window to find that file.
Can you please pull up Finder for me?

sideA.text: Ve a la carpeta de "Aplicaciones" dentro del Finder.

sideB: Go to the 'Applications' folder inside Finder.
In Finder, please navigate to your 'Applications' folder.
Can you open the 'Applications' folder from the Finder's sidebar?

sideA.text: Anda al Dock de abajo y abre el Launchpad.

sideB: Go to the Dock at the bottom and open Launchpad.
Down in your Dock, please click on the Launchpad icon.
Let's open Launchpad from your Dock.

sideA.text: Necesitamos ir a la carpeta de "Descargas" para encontrar el instalador.

sideB: We need to go to the 'Downloads' folder to find the installer.
Can you navigate to your 'Downloads' folder, please?
Let's find that installer. Go ahead and open your 'Downloads' folder.

sideA.text: Ve a la barra de men√∫ de arriba y haz clic en el √≠cono de Wi-Fi.

sideB: Go to the menu bar at the top and click the Wi-Fi icon.
In the top menu bar, please click on the Wi-Fi symbol.
Up on your menu bar, can you click the Wi-Fi icon for me?

sideA.text: Abre Spotlight con Comando+Espacio para buscar "Monitor de Actividad".

sideB: Open Spotlight with Command-Space and search for 'Activity Monitor'.
Hit Command-Space to bring up Spotlight, then type 'Activity Monitor'.
Let's use Spotlight. Press Command and Spacebar, then look for 'Activity Monitor'.

sideA.text: Necesito que vayas a tu carpeta de "Documentos" y busques el reporte.

sideB: I need you to go to your 'Documents' folder and look for the report.
Can you please go into your 'Documents' folder and find the report file?
Let's navigate to your 'Documents' folder to find that report.

sideA.text: Vuelve al escritorio un momento para que pueda ver los √≠conos que tienes ah√≠.

sideB: Go back to the desktop for a moment so I can see the icons you have there.
Can you show me your desktop for a second?

sideA.text: Anda a la carpeta "Utilidades" dentro de "Aplicaciones" y abre la "Utilidad de Discos".

sideB: Go to the 'Utilities' folder inside 'Applications' and open 'Disk Utility'.
In your 'Applications' folder, please find the 'Utilities' folder and then launch 'Disk Utility'.
Can you navigate to Applications, then Utilities, and open 'Disk Utility'?

sideA.text: Haz clic primario en el √≠cono que est√° en la esquina superior izquierda.

sideB: Go ahead and left-click the icon in the top-left corner.
Just click on the icon in the upper-left.
Please give the top-left icon a regular click.

sideA.text: Ahora, haz clic secundario sobre el nombre del archivo para que aparezca el men√∫ de opciones.

sideB: Now, right-click on the filename to bring up the options menu.
Go ahead and right-click the file's name to see the options.
Can you right-click the filename so the context menu appears?

sideA.text: Con el bot√≥n derecho, haz clic en un espacio vac√≠o del escritorio para crear una nueva carpeta.

sideB: Right-click on an empty space on the desktop to create a new folder.
Use the right mouse button and click anywhere on the desktop to make a new folder.
Go ahead and right-click the desktop background and select 'New Folder'.

sideA.text: Dale doble clic a esa carpeta para que se abra.

sideB: Double-click that folder to open it.
Go ahead and give that folder a double-click.
Just double-click on that folder.

sideA.text: Necesito que expandas el men√∫ "Configuraci√≥n" que est√° en el panel lateral.

sideB: I need you to expand the 'Settings' menu in the side panel.
Can you please expand the 'Settings' section over on the sidebar?
Go ahead and click the little arrow to expand the 'Settings' menu.

sideA.text: Deselecciona esa casilla y, en su lugar, marca la que est√° justo debajo.

sideB: Deselect that checkbox and check the one right below it instead.
Uncheck that box and then tick the next one down.
Please unselect that option and select the one underneath it.

sideA.text: Haz clic en cualquier parte fuera de la tabla para que nada quede seleccionado.

sideB: Click anywhere outside the table so that nothing is selected.
Just click off the table to deselect everything.
Can you click on the background to clear the selection?

sideA.text: Mant√©n presionado el clic sobre el archivo y arr√°stralo hacia la ventana del correo.

sideB: Click and hold on the file, then drag it over to the email window.
Press and hold the mouse button on the file and drag it into the email.
Go ahead and drag and drop that file onto the email window.

sideA.text: Ahora, colapsa la vista de carpetas para que no ocupe tanto espacio.

sideB: Now, collapse the folder view so it doesn't take up so much space.
Go ahead and collapse the folder tree on the left.
Can you please click the arrow to collapse that folder panel?

sideA.text: Anda a la barra de men√∫ de arriba, busca "Ver" y luego haz clic en "Zoom".

sideB: Go to the menu bar at the top, find 'View', and then click 'Zoom'.
Navigate to the 'View' menu up top and select 'Zoom'.
In the top menu bar, please go to 'View' and then click 'Zoom'.

sideA.text: Posiciona el cursor sobre el enlace para que veamos la vista previa, pero no hagas clic todav√≠a.

sideB: Hover your cursor over the link so we can see the preview, but don't click yet.
Just move the mouse over that link, but don't click on it.
Can you hover over the link so we can see what the tooltip says?

sideA.text: Baja con la rueda del mouse (o haz scroll) hasta el final de la p√°gina.

sideB: Scroll down with your mouse wheel until you get to the bottom of the page.
Go ahead and scroll all the way down to the footer.
Please scroll to the very bottom of the page.

sideA.text: Cierra esa ventana emergente de publicidad que acaba de salir.

sideB: Close that ad pop-up window that just appeared.
Go ahead and close out that pop-up.
Can you get rid of that pop-up window, please?

sideA.text: Cambia a la pesta√±a del navegador donde tienes abierto el reporte.

sideB: Switch to the browser tab where you have the report open.
Can you please navigate to the tab with the report?
Let's switch over to the report tab in your browser.

sideA.text: F√≠jate en la barra de estado de abajo, ¬øqu√© mensaje te aparece?

sideB: Check the status bar at the bottom, what message does it show?
Take a look at the status bar down below, what does it say?
Can you tell me what the message is in the status bar at the bottom?

sideA.text: Selecciona todo ese p√°rrafo, desde la primera hasta la √∫ltima palabra.

sideB: Select that entire paragraph, from the first word to the last.
Go ahead and highlight that whole paragraph.
Please select all the text in that paragraph.

sideA.text: Guarda el documento con otro nombre usando la opci√≥n "Guardar como".

sideB: Save the document with a different name using the 'Save As' option.
Please go to 'File' and then 'Save As' to give it a new name.
Go ahead and use 'Save As' to save a copy with another name.

sideA.text: Refresca la p√°gina para asegurarnos de que estamos viendo la √∫ltima versi√≥n.

sideB: Refresh the page to make sure we're seeing the latest version.
Can you hit refresh so we can see the updated content?
Please reload the page now.

sideA.text: Confirma que la opci√≥n "Guardado autom√°tico" est√© activada.

sideB: Confirm that the 'Auto-save' option is enabled.
Please make sure the 'Auto-save' feature is turned on.
Can you please check if 'Auto-save' is active?

sideA.text: Usa el atajo de teclado Control + F para abrir la barra de b√∫squeda.

sideB: Use the keyboard shortcut Control + F to open the search bar.
You can just hit Control + F to bring up the search box.
Go ahead and press Control + F to find something on the page.

sideA.text: Arrastra el archivo de la esquina superior derecha hacia el centro.

sideB: Drag the file from the top-right corner to the center.
Go ahead and drag the file from the upper-right to the middle of the screen.
Can you drag that file in the top right over to the center?

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en el icono de la esquina superior izquierda.

sideB: Right-click on the icon in the top-left corner.
Can you right-click the icon in the upper-left?
Please give the top-left icon a right-click.

sideA.text: Haz click en el bot√≥n de la esquina inferior derecha.

sideB: Click the button in the bottom-right corner.
Go ahead and click the button in the lower-right.
Please click on the bottom-right button.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en el men√∫ de la esquina inferior izquierda.

sideB: Right-click on the menu in the bottom-left corner.
Please right-click the menu in the lower-left.
Can you give the bottom-left menu a right-click?

sideA.text: Haz doble click en la imagen de la esquina superior derecha.

sideB: Double-click the image in the top-right corner.
Go ahead and double-click the picture in the upper-right.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en la carpeta de la esquina superior izquierda.

sideB: Right-click the folder in the top-left corner.
Can you right-click on the folder in the upper-left?
Please right-click that top-left folder.

sideA.text: Haz doble click en el icono de la esquina inferior derecha.

sideB: Double-click the icon in the bottom-right corner.
Go ahead and double-click the icon at the lower-right.
Just give the bottom-right icon a double-click.

sideA.text: Selecciona el archivo de la esquina inferior izquierda.

sideB: Select the file in the bottom-left corner.
Go ahead and highlight the file in the lower-left.
Please click on the file in the bottom-left to select it.

sideA.text: Haz click en el bot√≥n central.

sideB: Click the center button.
Go ahead and click the button in the middle.
Please click on the central button.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en la imagen que est√° justo al centro.

sideB: Right-click the image that's right in the center.
Go ahead and right-click the picture in the middle.
Can you right-click the central image?

sideA.text: Selecciona todo el texto del medio de la pantalla.

sideB: Select all the text in the middle of the screen.
Go ahead and highlight the text in the center of the screen.
Can you select that block of text in the middle?

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en el enlace central de la lista.

sideB: Right-click the center link in the list.
Please right-click the link in the middle of the list.
Can you right-click the middle link from that list?

sideA.text: Haz click en el bot√≥n que est√° arriba.

sideB: Click the button that's at the top.
Go ahead and click the button above.
Please click the top button.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en la opci√≥n que est√° abajo.

sideB: Right-click the option that's at the bottom.
Go ahead and right-click the option below.
Can you right-click the bottom option?

sideA.text: Arrastra el icono que est√° a la izquierda hacia la papelera.

sideB: Drag the icon on the left over to the trash.
Go ahead and drag the leftmost icon to the trash can.
Please drag the icon on the left and drop it in the trash.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en la pesta√±a que est√° a la derecha.

sideB: Right-click the tab that's on the right.
Please right-click the tab to the right.
Can you right-click the rightmost tab?

sideA.text: Haz doble click en la carpeta que est√° arriba.

sideB: Double-click the folder that's at the top.
Go ahead and double-click the folder above.
Please double-click the top folder.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en el archivo que est√° abajo.

sideB: Right-click the file that's at the bottom.
Go ahead and right-click the file below.
Can you right-click the bottom file?

sideA.text: Haz doble click en el icono que est√° a la izquierda.

sideB: Double-click the icon that's on the left.
Please double-click the icon to the left.
Go ahead and double-click the leftmost icon.

sideA.text: Arrastra la imagen que est√° a la derecha hacia la carpeta de arriba.

sideB: Drag the image on the right into the folder at the top.
Go ahead and drag the rightmost picture to the folder above.
Please drag the picture on the right and drop it in the top folder.

sideA.text: Haz click en el bot√≥n azul de la esquina superior derecha.

sideB: Click the blue button in the top-right corner.
Go ahead and click the blue button in the upper-right.
Please click on that blue button in the top right.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en la flecha gris de la esquina inferior izquierda.

sideB: Right-click the gray arrow in the bottom-left corner.
Please right-click the gray arrow in the lower-left.
Can you give the gray arrow in the bottom left a right-click?

sideA.text: Haz doble click en la foto grande que est√° al centro.

sideB: Double-click the large photo that's in the center.
Go ahead and double-click the big picture in the middle.
Please give the large photo in the center a double-click.

sideA.text: Selecciona la opci√≥n que est√° justo entre el bot√≥n rojo y el bot√≥n verde.

sideB: Select the option that's right between the red button and the green button.
Go ahead and highlight the option between the red and green buttons.
Please select the option located in the middle of the red and green buttons.

sideA.text: Haz click secundario en el icono peque√±o que est√° debajo del t√≠tulo.

sideB: Right-click the small icon that's below the title.
Please right-click the little icon underneath the title.
Go ahead and right-click the small icon just below the title.

sideA.text: Selecciona el texto que aparece sobre el bot√≥n azul.

sideB: Select the text that appears above the blue button.
Go ahead and highlight the text over the blue button.
Please select the text right on top of the blue button.

sideA.text: Arrastra lo que est√° abajo a la izquierda, hacia arriba.

sideB: Drag the bottom-left item up.
Pull the item on the bottom-left up.
Move the bottom-left item up.
Drag the bottom-left item upwards

sideA.text: Mueve lo que est√° arriba a la derecha, hacia abajo.

sideB: Move the top-right item down.
Drag the top-right item down.
Lower the item on the top-right.
Move the top-right item downwards.

sideA.text: Mueve lo que est√° a la derecha, hacia la izquierda.

sideB: Move the item on the right to the left.
Drag the right item to the left.
Shift the item on the right to the left.

sideA.text: Mueve lo que est√° a la izquierda, hacia la derecha.

sideB: Move the item on the left to the right.
Drag the left item to the right.
Shift the item on the left to the right.

sideA.text: Selecciona la secci√≥n de la izquierda y mu√©vela m√°s hacia la izquierda.

sideB: Select the left section and move it further left.
Move the left section further to the left.
Slide the left section more to the left.

sideA.text: Selecciona la secci√≥n de la derecha y mu√©vela m√°s hacia la derecha.

sideB: Select the right section and move it further right.
Move the right section further to the right.
Slide the right section more to the right.

sideA.text: Selecciona la secci√≥n de arriba y mu√©vela hacia abajo.

sideB: Select the top section and move it down.
Drag the top section down.
Move the top section lower.
Select the top section and move it downwards.

sideA.text: Arrastra la secci√≥n de abajo a la derecha, hacia arriba.

sideB: Drag the bottom-right section up.
Pull the bottom-right section up.
Move the bottom-right section to the top.
Drag the bottom-right section upwards.

sideA.text: Mueve la secci√≥n de arriba a la izquierda, hacia abajo.

sideB: Move the top-left section down.
Drag the top-left section down.
Lower the top-left section.
Move the top-left section downwards.

sideA.text: Selecciona lo que est√° en el centro y mu√©velo hacia la derecha.

sideB: Select the center item and move it right.
Drag the middle item to the right.
Move the item in the center to the right.

sideA.text: Selecciona lo que est√° en el centro y mu√©velo hacia la izquierda.

sideB: Select the center item and move it left.
Drag the middle item to the left.
Move the item in the center to the left.

sideA.text: Arrastra lo que est√° abajo en el centro, hacia arriba.

sideB: Drag the bottom-center item up.
Pull the item in the bottom-center up.
Move the bottom-center item to the top.
Drag the bottom-center item upwards.

sideA.text: Mueve lo que est√° arriba en el centro, hacia abajo.

sideB: Move the top-center item down.
Drag the top-center item down.
Lower the item in the top-center.
Move the top-center item downwards.

sideA.text: Mueve lo que est√° en el centro hacia el centro superior.

sideB: Move the center item to the top-center.
Shift the middle item to the top-center.
Drag the center item to the top-center.

sideA.text: The main rectangular area on a screen that displays the content of an application.

sideB: Window

sideA.text: A clickable label within a window that lets you switch between different pages or sections.

sideB: Tab

sideA.text: The area in a browser that displays all the currently open tabs.

sideB: Tab bar
Tabs bar

sideA.text: The field at the top of a browser where you type a website's address.

sideB: Address bar
URL bar
Location bar

sideA.text: A row of buttons and icons that provide quick access to an application's functions.

sideB: Toolbar

sideA.text: The button that shrinks a window down to the taskbar without closing it.

sideB: Minimize button

sideA.text: The button that makes a window fill the entire screen or returns it to its previous size.

sideB: Maximize / Restore button
Resize button

sideA.text: The button, often marked with an 'X', used to exit or close a window.

sideB: Close button
Exit button
X button

sideA.text: The menu that appears when you click the right mouse button on an item.

sideB: Context menu
Right-click menu
Shortcut menu

sideA.text: A bar at the bottom of a window that displays information like zoom level or page count.

sideB: Status bar

sideA.text: The control that allows you to move the view of a page up, down, left, or right.

sideB: Scrollbar
Scroll bar

sideA.text: The on-screen pointer or arrow that indicates the position of the mouse.

sideB: Cursor
Pointer
Mouse pointer

sideA.text: A small graphical representation of a program, file, or function.

sideB: Icon
Icon button

sideA.text: A new, smaller window that appears on top of the current one, often for alerts or ads.

sideB: Popup window
Pop-up
Dialog popup

sideA.text: The browser tab that you are currently viewing.

sideB: Active tab
Current tab

sideA.text: Any browser tab that is open but not currently being viewed.

sideB: Inactive tab
Background tab

sideA.text: A browser tab that has just been opened and has no content loaded yet.

sideB: New tab
Blank tab
Empty tab

sideA.text: The default page that loads when you open your web browser.

sideB: Homepage
Home page
Start page

sideA.text: The page that is displayed by default when you open a new, blank tab.

sideB: New tab page
Start tab page

sideA.text: A browser mode that doesn't save your Browse history, cookies, or site data.

sideB: Private window
Incognito window
Private Browse

sideA.text: A toolbar in a browser where you can save shortcuts to your favorite websites.

sideB: Bookmarks bar
Favorites bar

sideA.text: A list of options that appears when you click on a button or menu item.

sideB: Dropdown menu
Drop-down list
Pull-down menu

sideA.text: The horizontal bar at the top of a window containing text menus like 'File', 'Edit', and 'View'.

sideB: Menu bar

sideA.text: The primary section of a window where the main document or application content is displayed.

sideB: Content area
Main area
Viewport

sideA.text: The button, often an arrow pointing left, that takes you to the previously visited page.

sideB: Back button
Go back button

sideA.text: The button, often an arrow pointing right, that takes you to the next page in your history.

sideB: Forward button
Go forward button

sideA.text: The button that re-downloads the content of the current web page.

sideB: Reload button
Refresh button

sideA.text: A vertical panel on the left or right of a window used for navigation.

sideB: Sidebar
Side panel
Navigation panel

sideA.text: The area on the taskbar, usually in the corner, that shows system icons and notifications.

sideB: Notification area
System tray

sideA.text: The main screen of an operating system where icons and windows appear.

sideB: Desktop

sideA.text: The background image or color of the main operating system screen.

sideB: Wallpaper
Desktop background

sideA.text: A window or panel that can be moved to sit on top of other application windows.

sideB: Floating window
Floating panel

sideA.text: A display mode where two application windows are shown side-by-side.

sideB: Split screen
Split view

sideA.text: A dialog window that requires user interaction before they can return to the main application.

sideB: Modal window
Dialog box
Modal dialog

sideA.text: A small box that a user can click to indicate 'yes' or 'no' on a form.

sideB: Checkbox

sideA.text: A control that allows a user to select only one option from a mutually exclusive set.

sideB: Radio button

sideA.text: A control that allows selecting a value from a continuous range by dragging a handle.

sideB: Slider
Track bar

sideA.text: A small box with informational text that appears when hovering over an element.

sideB: Tooltip
Hint
Infotip

sideA.text: Clickable text or an image that takes you to another document or webpage.

sideB: Hyperlink
Link

sideA.text: A navigation trail that shows the user's location in a website or application.

sideB: Breadcrumbs
Breadcrumb trail

sideA.text: The content block at the very top of a webpage, often containing a logo and navigation.

sideB: Header

sideA.text: The content block at the very bottom of a webpage, often containing copyright and contact info.

sideB: Footer

sideA.text: A UI element that can be clicked to show or hide content, like in an FAQ section.

sideB: Accordion
Collapsible panel

sideA.text: A rotating slideshow of images or content on a webpage.

sideB: Carousel
Image slider

sideA.text: A switch that allows a user to turn a setting on or off.

sideB: Toggle switch
Toggle button

sideA.text: A field used to enter text.

sideB: Text box
Input field
Text field

sideA.text: The blinking vertical line inside a text field that shows the insertion point for typing.

sideB: Caret
Text cursor

sideA.text: A bar that shows the progress of a task, such as a download or installation.

sideB: Progress bar

sideA.text: The horizontal bar at the bottom of the OS screen that shows open applications.

sideB: Taskbar
Dock

sideA.text: A temporary storage area where material cut or copied from a file is kept for pasting.

sideB: Clipboard

sideA.text: A clickable element that performs a specific action.

sideB: Button

sideA.text: A graphical control element that is a visual representation of a file, folder, or program.

sideB: Icon

sideA.text: A list of commands or options available to the user.

sideB: Menu

sideA.text: A temporary name for a file or piece of data before it is formally named.

sideB: Placeholder

sideA.text: An automated sequence of instructions or commands.

sideB: Script
Macro

sideA.text: The text displayed in a form field before the user enters a value.

sideB: Placeholder text
Hint text

sideA.text: A section in a settings or preferences window, often organized by a tab.

sideB: Panel
Pane

sideA.text: The set of options and configurations available for a piece of software.

sideB: Settings
Preferences
Options

sideA.text: A small, scrollable window within a larger window or webpage.

sideB: Frame
iFrame

sideA.text: A file that can be executed to install or run a program.

sideB: Executable
.exe file
